attributes.action: make a public statement regarding his Goverment's position on the Bilderberg Group.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Bilderberg Group is a meeting of the most powerful people on the planet.

They meet every year behind armed guards and lots of security. Nothing they talk about is disclosed to the public through conventional media.

Attendees include royalty, bankers, politicians and media owners.

Here an elite plan the future of mankind, except mankind is not invited to listen in or even know what was discussed.

Our Prime Minister should make his position clear on whether he supports members of his Cabinet attending such a meeting.

He should voice his support or opposition to this group and their agenda at his earliest oppurtunity, to allow the public to understand his position once and for all.
